name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in plank position with hands shoulder-width apart. Lower body until chest nearly touches ground, then push back up. Keep core engaged throughout movement.

name: Pull-ups
instructions: Hang from bar with palms facing away. Pull body up until chin clears bar, then lower with control. Focus on squeezing shoulder blades together.

name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie on bench with feet flat on floor. Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders. Lower bar to chest, then press up explosively.

name: Shoulder Press
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at shoulder height. Press weights overhead until arms are fully extended. Lower with control.

name: Bent-over Row
instructions: Hinge at hips with knees slightly bent. Pull bar to lower chest while squeezing shoulder blades. Lower with control.

name: Squats
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower body as if sitting back into chair. Keep chest up and knees tracking over toes.

name: Deadlifts
instructions: Stand with bar over mid-foot. Hinge at hips and knees to grip bar. Drive through heels to stand up straight.

name: Lunges
instructions: Step forward into lunge position. Lower back knee toward ground while keeping front knee over ankle. Push back to start.

name: Hip Thrusts
instructions: Lie with shoulder blades against bench, feet flat on floor. Drive hips up while squeezing glutes at the top.

name: Calf Raises
instructions: Stand on balls of feet on platform. Raise up onto toes as high as possible, then lower slowly.

name: Burpees
instructions: Drop into squat, kick feet back to plank, do push-up, jump feet forward, then jump up with arms overhead.

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in plank position. Alternate bringing knees toward chest in rapid succession while maintaining plank form.

name: Plank
instructions: Hold plank position with forearms on ground and body in straight line. Keep core tight and avoid sagging hips.

name: Russian Twists
instructions: Sit with knees bent and feet lifted. Lean back slightly and rotate torso side to side while holding weight.

name: Bicycle Crunches
instructions: Lie on back with hands behind head. Bring opposite elbow to knee while extending other leg. Alternate sides continuously.
